author: jdcasey
msg: [MJAR-28] Update to use maven-archiver 2.4-snapshot, which provides much more control over classpath layout, including the type of snapshot versioning to use.

author: jdcasey
msg: improve documentation for classpath examples some more, and add useUniqueVersions feature to manifest configuration for use in repository and simple (default) classpath layouts, to use -SNAPSHOT versions vs. timestamp/buildnumber. Default is true, which uses timestamp versions.
